Who We Are

ISCHOOL is a school solution app, founded and supported by ITEC Team.

Our app is excellent at maintaining, managing and processing the school data, such as students results, attendances, school fees, etc.

Read More

What we do

We Offer Most Effective Creative Solutions For Modern Schools

The following are some of the few features we have include on our platform to make your work easier.

Discover More

Result Management

Our software allows you to conveniently process and document your students report cards with just few clicks of buttons.

Read More

School Fees

On Ischool, school fees management is made easy by allowing you to update school fees payments with easy, printing receipts and school fees reminder.

Read More

Integrating Sections

Organize your students from all sections of the school, Islamic, Tahfiz and Conventional sections, managing your school fees and generating a consistent student report card templates.

Read More

Cloud

Upgrade your school by joining the cloud solution to deliver student performance reports to the parents with our online results and assignments solutions.

Read More

CBT & Pass Questions

Equip your students with hands-on excercises from WAEC, NECO & JAMB past questions for preparation for their exams, as early as possible.

Read More
